Class TotalisticRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • Rule
      • TotalisticRule
  • public class TotalisticRule
extends Rule
    TotalisticRule is a subclass of the abstract class Rule. This class specifically the rules for a Totalistic Cellular Automaton.
    Author:
    Natalie Hill
